publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-883.1 Derek Brownlee: Scottish Government’s Economic Strategy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-883) in the name of John Swinney, insert at end "and, recognising the importance of small businesses to the Scottish economy, calls on the Scottish Government, if additional resources become available, to prioritise the acceleration of the full implementation of the reductions in business rates for small businesses announced in the budget on 14 November 2007."
